attributes.additional_details:
The current state of Bradford city centre is unacceptable, businesses are closing, consumers will not come into the city for lack of choice and lack of occupied buildings. Regeneration has been at a stand still for many years - this cannot be allowed to continue!

We intend to Occupy Westfield, Bradford! We refuse to bow to corrupt and incompetent politicians!!

The people of Bradford, demand answers and answers is what we shall get!

Get behind us and sign this petition!!
